name: Block Breaker (frjurado)
description:
This is my first complete project from this nice Unity Udemy course. It's a Breakout/Arkanoid clone with basic graphics (not much of a 2D artist myself) but cool, retro, 8-bit music composed for the ocassion, implemented with FMOD Studio.

Ball bouncing is still somewhat buggy, and level design hasn't been thoroughly playtested.

Have a try! You have eight levels to enjoy!
